message.I1001:
Row Deletion: Highlight the date and press the "Delete" button on the keyboard.
Row Copy: Press Ctrl + C. 
Row Paste: Press "Ctrl + V.
To amend the duty time, please input the time in "On Duty (A)" or "Off Duty (A)" 
To change work day type: Double Click the date.
message.I1002: Please click the button that corresponds to function desired. To confirm or amend the duty time\, please click the "Employee List" button.
message.I1003: Please insert the Employee Number and Password\, or perform fingerprint recognition by using the terminal for user registration.
message.I1004: By double-clicking the corresponding data\, the input screen will be displayed. The registration number is the registered user ID in the fingerprint recognition terminal. Only the employee who has been assigned a password can login the system.
message.I1006: Please configure the holiday. Regular holiday can be added collectively from the following input item. The deleted company's holiday data cannot be changed.
message.I1010: Please insert timetable. \nPlease select "Working Hour Unit" as the round down unit of total daily working hours (in terms of minute). \nPlease select "Overtime Unit" as the round down unit of total daily overtime hours (in terms of minute).
message.I1012: Please configure to a format matching with the payroll software you are using. The item(s) shown in the list on the lefthand side of the "Output Item" will be output. For more details\, please refer to the menu of the payroll software.
message.I1013: Please select the employee whose attendance list is required. To print or output to file\, please click the check box of the employee record or double-click the employee record.
message.I1014: Please configure the Cut-off Day and Working Time Unit. Please selecte "Working Time Unit" as the round down unit of the monthly total working hours (in terms of minute).
message.I1015: Please insert the Fingerprint Terminal information.
message.I1016: Please insert the Employee Number and Password.
message.I1017: Please insert the Employee Information. The Employee Number cannot be changed. Only the employee who has been assigned a password can login the system.
message.I1018: Please insert the Employee Information. Only the employee who has assigned a password can login the system.
message.I1019: Please input the server name of the database.

message.S0015: Failure occurred while acquiring the attendance data of the Fingerprint Recognition Terminal. Please make sure the Employee Number and Password are inserted and click "Login".,0,16
message.S0101: Error occurred while outputting the record. Microsoft Excel has not yet been installed.,0,16
